page.title: 16ST.GEORGE'S CHURCH (CONT.)
page.content: We do know that they are the{Apostles though because one is St. Peter holding some keys.Perhaps the sculptors ran out of room and couldn't fit the other three on. One of the {stained glass windows}has a clock in it and when the sun shines through it you can see the time. But it only shows the hours from one to seven. The pulpit is a fine example of {Jacobean}woodwork.On one wall there is a picture of a king painted and the crown he is wearing is painted with real gold! It is{Edward II.}There is also a painting of his wife{Queen {Isabella}who fell in love with{Roger {Mortimer of Wigmore Castle.}This started the{War of the Roses. There is a fourteenth century {preaching cross}in the churchyard.The church has a{weather dragon}instead of a weather cock because of{St. George.
